title: Can I go into business with a friend who believes in prayer but doesn't pray? - assim al hakeem
transcript: so yes I actually wanted to ask you if you have a friend that believes in in the faith but he doesn't pray so like I do have some other friends that I pray will I be simply if I start a business partnership with him knowing that uh I have to keep like some kind of like regulations when dealing with him as long as he's labeled as Muslim and no judicial court or system or a Muslim judge has confirmed that he's an apostate or a kafir then you can go into business with him and be a partner with him while still trying every now and then to advise him to pray with you to the best of your ability insha Allah
